page.title: 12THE GLEN CLOVA POST BUS.
page.content: The Post Bus is a Freight Rover, 2000cc, and brand new. It has a 15 gallon petrol tank. The bus from Monday- Fiday leaves Kirriemuir at 8:30am & 3:05pm and arrives at Clova Hotel at 10:00am & 3:35pm . It arrives back in Kirriemuir at 11:50am & 4:30pm On Saturday it only does the morning run. The bus can carry 11 passengers not including the driver. The fare from Kiriemuir to Clova Hotel is Â£1.05. The bus carries letters, newspapers and groceries. The average amount of people who travel on the bus is 30 but most travel only as far as Dykehead. The postmen think the new bus is better to drive than the old one but the passengers preferred the old bus because it had a back door and a side door. The new one has only a back door,the step is too high off the ground and the seats are too bouncy.
